mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_ID, EMP_NO, TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_TYPE) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_ID),0) +1 FROM BOARD), #{empNo}, #{title}, #{boardContents}, #{boardType})
mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NAME, B.* FROM BOARD B join EMPLOYEES E on B.emp_no = E.emp_no WHERE B.board_id = #{boardId}
